attributes.action: Outlaw the use of unsolicited marketing faxes sent to businesses and universities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unwanted faxes offering goods and services that continually come through on fax machines waste time and paper when industry is trying to cut costs. Unnecessary wastage of paper and fax machine use in environmentally unfriendly, wasting resources and adding to glabal warming.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
